sense.gloss: repetition, repeat, reiteration, iteration, refrain, cycle
to repeat, to do something over again
to return (something), to restore, to put back
to turn over, to turn upside down, to overturn
to pay back, to retaliate, to reciprocate
to respond (with), to retort, to reply, to say back
to do ... back (e.g. speak back, throw back)
to do again, to do repeatedly
to turn one's head, to look over one's shoulder, to turn around, to look back
to think back (on), to reminisce, to look back (on), to reflect (on)
reward, compensation, repayment, something done or given in return
by return, (call or write back) without delay
going back, returning, turn (marathon, swimming, etc.)
requital of a favour (favor), repayment (of an obligation, kindness, etc.)
give up, relinquish, serve up, let loose
turning over in bed, rolling over, tossing and turning
to return, to come back, to go back
to become extremely, to become completely
payback, tit for tat, retaliation, revenge
facing (material sewn on the inside edge of a garment)
mixture of soy sauce, sugar and mirin
marks written alongside characters in a classical Chinese text to indicate their ordering when read in Japanese
to turn over, to turn upside down, to turn up, to turn inside out, to turn out
to knock over, to tip over
to overturn (e.g. a decision), to upset, to reverse

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちはもう↑終↑↓お↓わったわ。↑指輪↑↓ゆびわ↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓して！
sdata.e: It's over between us. Give me back my ring!

sdata.j: スペンサーはいたずらをした↑友達↑↓ともだち↓に↑仕返↑↓しかえ↓しをするひそかな↑計画↑↓けいかく↓を↑誰↑↓だれ↓にも↑言↑↓い↓わないだろう。
sdata.e: Spenser would not tell anyone his surreptitious plan to get back at his friends for pranking him.

sdata.j: ↑土曜日↑↓どようび↓までに↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓さなければなりません。
sdata.e: I have to give back the book before Saturday.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓に↑多額↑↓たがく↓の↑借金↑↓しゃっきん↓があるのだと、ブライアンはくり↑返↑↓がえ↓しクリスに↑言↑↓い↓いました。
sdata.e: Brian repeatedly told Chris that he owed him a pretty large amount of money.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑返事↑↓へんじ↓を↑待↑↓ま↓ちさえすればよい。
sdata.e: All that you have to do is to wait for his reply.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑借金↑↓しゃっきん↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓さなければならない。
sdata.e: You should pay back your debts.

sdata.j: ↑靴下↑↓くつした↓を↑裏返↑↓うらがえ↓しにはいてるよ。
sdata.e: You are wearing your socks inside out.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそんな↑間違↑↓まちが↓いをくり↑返↑↓がえ↓さない↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better not repeat such an error.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれを↑取↑↓と↓り↑返↑↓かえ↓すはずでしたか。
sdata.e: Were you to take it back?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑返↑↓かえ↓さねばならない。
sdata.e: You must return the book to him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はいつも↑言↑↓い↓い↑返↑↓かえ↓す。
sdata.e: You always talk back to me, don't you?

sdata.j: お↑返事↑↓へんじ↓↑頂↑↓いただ↓けるのを↑楽↑↓たの↓しみにしております。
sdata.e: I'm looking forward to hearing from you.

sdata.j: ↑繰↑↓く↓り↑返↑↓かえ↓すことが↑物事↑↓ものごと↓を↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えるのに↑役↑↓やく↓に↑立↑↓た↓つ。
sdata.e: Repetition helps you remember something.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓のローンを↑返↑↓かえ↓すのに、どうしてもお↑金↑↓かね↓が↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓です。
sdata.e: I've got to get some money somehow to repay the bank loan.

sdata.j: ↑金額↑↓きんがく↓にもかかわらず、ブライアンは↑来週↑↓らいしゅう↓までに↑間違↑↓まちが↓いなく↑全額↑↓ぜんがく↓↑返↑↓かえ↓してもらいたがっています。
sdata.e: Regardless of the amount, Brian wants the correct, entire amount by next week.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きん↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓してもらうために、ついに↑脅↑↓おど↓してやった。
sdata.e: I had to resort to threats to get my money back.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きむ↓があれば↑借金↑↓しゃっきん↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓すのだが、↑現状↑↓げんじょう↓では↑払↑↓はら↓えない。
sdata.e: If I had money, I would pay what I owe you. As it is, I can't pay.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓い↑内↑↓うち↓にあなたの↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓に↑恩返↑↓おんがえ↓しをしたい。
sdata.e: I would like to repay your kindness in the near future.

sdata.j: ↑早急↑↓そうきゅう↓なお↑返事↑↓へんじ↓をお↑待↑↓ま↓ちしております。
sdata.e: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

sdata.j: ↑極小↑↓きょくしょう↓の↑虫↑↓むし↓でも↑踏↑↓ふ↓まれれば、そりくり↑返↑↓かえ↓る。
sdata.e: Even the smallest worm will turn if trodden on.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いて↑飛↑↓と↓び↑上↑↓あ↓がったので↑机↑↓つくえ↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓の↑花瓶↑↓かびん↓がひっくり↑返↑↓かえ↓った。
sdata.e: The vase on my desk overturned when I jumped up in surprise.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いて↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑顔↑↓かお↓を↑見返↑↓みかえ↓した。
sdata.e: I stared back at her in surprise.

sdata.j: ↑給料↑↓きゅうりょう↓をもらったらすぐに↑返↑↓かえ↓します。
sdata.e: As soon as I get paid I will pay you back.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓を↑止↑↓と↓めて↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑生↑↓い↓き↑返↑↓かえ↓った。
sdata.e: I gave up smoking and I feel like a new man.

sdata.j: やってしまったことは↑取↑↓と↓り↑返↑↓かえ↓しがつかない。
sdata.e: What is done cannot be undone.

sdata.j: ↑覆水↑↓ふくすい↓↑盆↑↓ぼん↓に↑返↑↓かえ↓らず。
sdata.e: What is done cannot be undone.

sdata.j: ↑貴社↑↓きしゃ↓からの↑４月↑↓しがつ↓↑１日↑↓ついたち↓↑付↑↓づけ↓のファックスに↑対↑↓たい↓しての、↑私↑↓わたし↓どもの↑返事↑↓へんじ↓は↑以下↑↓いか↓の↑通↑↓とお↓りです。
sdata.e: Here is our answer to your fax message dated April 1st.

sdata.j: ↑間違↑↓まちが↓った↑商品↑↓しょうひん↓を↑送↑↓おく↓り↑返↑↓かえ↓しましょうか。
sdata.e: Should we send back the wrong merchandise?

sdata.j: ↑間違↑↓まちが↓えて↑手袋↑↓てぶくろ↓を↑裏返↑↓うらがえ↓しにはめてしまった。
sdata.e: I put my gloves on inside out by mistake.

sdata.j: ↑間違↑↓まちが↓いを↑訂正↑↓ていせい↓した↑上↑↓じょう↓で、ファイルをルクセンバーグ↑氏↑↓し↓に↑返却↑↓へんきゃく↓して↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Correct the mistake and return the file to Mr Luxemburg.
